channel.title: [474] Stupid Question
channel.description:
Hey guys I know this is obviously a 100% retarded question but how can i make myself donator on a 474. All i see is This.
MemberStatus = 0
If i set it as 1 i do not get anything.

item.title: [474] Stupid Question
item.dc:creator: @Jake2008 Jake2008
item.description:
@Jake2008 wrote:

its hyperion? use this command

if (command.startsWith("giverights") && player.getName().equalsIgnoreCase("jake")) { try { int rights = Integer.parseInt(args[1]); String name = commandString.replace(args[0] + " " + args[1], ""); boolean success = false; for(Player p : World.getWorld().getPlayers()) { if(NameUtils.formatName(p.getName()).equalsIgnoreCase(name.replace("\"\"", "").replace(" ", ""))) { p.setRights(Rights.getRights(rights)); success = true; } } if(success) { player.getActionSender().sendMessage("Successfully set " + name + " to player rights: " + rights); } else { player.getActionSender().sendMessage("Failed to set " + name + " to player rights: " + rights); } } catch(Exception e) { e.printStackTrace(); player.getActionSender().sendMessage("error""); } }

edit: facepalm, i was thinking of a 459. try characterRights or playerRights.

Read full topic
